entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Brooks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brooks 2:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: W 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 20 February 2023
